definitions.body: act. [[בָּרֵךְ עַל־בִּרְכוֹ֫הִי]] Da 6:11 kneeling on his knees (in prayer).
pass. [[בְּרִיךְ]] Da 3:28 blessed (be) the God, etc.

definitions.title: Pa.
definitions.body: bless, praise: Pf. 3 ms. [[בָּרִךְ]] Da 2:19, 1 S. [[בָּֽתְכֵת]] (K:§ 39:3) Da 4:31, both c. [[ל]] of God; Pt. pass. [[מְבָרַךְ]] Da 2:20 the name of God (be) blessed.
